name: Tabdil.app Persian Weight Converter
author: Jafar Naghizadeh

sections.description:
With this plugin you will easily put a conversion form for converting 41 international and Iranian (Persian) weight units, Anywhere in your website.

How to use

  1. First Install the plugin.
  2. Use the plugin’s main Shortcode anywhere inside any Page or Post: [tabdil persianWeight]

Shortcode

Anywhere you put this shortcode conversion form whil be shown:
[tabdil persianWeight]

How to edit css

The sass files are available in the package in the /sass folder. You can edit and compile it. You can find the sass documentation here.

Live demo

For an online live demo of this plugin you can visit this page:
TabdilApp Persian weight converter
sections.faq:
Where we can find the list of Persian weight units?

In wikipedia there is full list of the units.

What about other Persian weight units?

We are going to add more Persian units in the next versions.
sections.changelog:
1.3

This version has tested and there is no compatibility issue with the WP 6.4.2.

1.2

This version has checked and validated that there is no compatibility issue with the WP 6.3.

1.1

This version of Persian weight converter checked and validated for compatibility with WP 6.2.

1.0

  • In This first version of Persian weight converter we have almost all international and Iranian weight units. There are 41 units available for now.

short_description: This plugin provides a conversion form for all international and Iranian (Persian) weight units Anywhere of your site you want.

upgrade_notice.1.3: This version is fully compatible with WP 6.4.2.
upgrade_notice.1.2: Has checked for compatibility with WP 6.3, and everything is OK ;)
